auth.loginDescription: Sign in with Discord to start tracking your maimai scores
auth.signupDescription: Create a new account to start tracking your maimai scores
auth.signupDisabledMessage: We are not accepting new registrations at this time. Please check back later.

features.title: Features:
features.trackScores: Track scores across International and Japan regions
features.importData: Import data directly from maimai DX NET

dashboard.title: maimai friends
dashboard.description: Track and analyze your maimai scores with friends

timezone.label: Timezone
timezone.description: This affects how dates and times are displayed throughout the app. Japan timezone is the default as it matches maimai's server time.

account.label: Account Authentication
account.description: Update your maimai token for data fetching. This is required to sync your player data.

profile.publishDescription: Make your maimai profile publicly accessible for others to view your scores and progress.

mainRegion.label: Main Region
mainRegion.description: Choose your primary region for the published profile.

showAllScores.label: Show All Scores
showAllScores.description: Display all your scores instead of only your best 50 songs.

showScoreDetails.label: Show Score Details
showScoreDetails.description: Show detailed score information including play counts and timing statistics.

showPlates.label: Show Plates
showPlates.description: Display your plate collection and completion progress.

showInSearch.label: Show in Search
showInSearch.description: Allow others to find your profile by searching for your username.

url.label: Profile URL
url.description: Your public profile link that you can share with others.
url.copyFailed: Failed to copy URL to clipboard

dataBanner.noDataInstructions: No data found for this region. Click "Fetch New Data" to import your maimai scores. You'll need your maimai token for this process.

dataContent.switchToListForAllSongs: Switch to List or Table view for all songs
dataContent.getStartedInstructions: Get started by fetching your maimai data using the fetch button above.

recommendations.allOptimal: All your scores are already optimal! Keep up the great work.
recommendations.description: Songs recommended to improve your rating based on your current B15/B35 scores.

tokenDialog.title: Update maimai authentication
tokenDialog.japanDescription: Enter your SEGA account credentials for the Japan region.
tokenDialog.intlDescription: Choose your authentication method for the International region.
tokenDialog.credentialsStored: Your credentials will be saved for future use.
tokenDialog.tokenValidationError: Token must start with "clal=" followed by letters and numbers only
tokenDialog.segaCredentialsNote: Use your SEGA account credentials to authenticate with maimai DX NET.
tokenDialog.credentialsSecureNote: Your credentials will be stored securely for future fetches.

tokenInstructions.description: Cookie value starting with "clal=" from maimai DX NET.
tokenInstructions.expiration: The token may get invalidated after a certain period of time, so you may need to update it in the future.

tokenDialog.passwordInstructions: Use your SEGA account username and password directly
tokenDialog.secureStorage: Your credentials will be stored securely for future fetches.
